Skip to contents
RefineBio 0.3.3
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    .refinebio_url
    refinebio url
    rb_compendia_list()
    List all CompendiaResults with filtering.
    rb_compendia_read()
    Get a specific Compendium Result
    rb_computational_results_list()
    This lists all ComputationalResult. Each one contains meta-information about the output of a computer process. (Ex Salmon).
    rb_computational_results_read()
    Retrieves a computational result by its ID
    rb_computed_files_list()
    ComputedFiles are representation of files created by refinebio processes.
    rb_computed_files_read()
    Retrieves a computed file by its ID
    rb_dataset_create()
    View and modify a single Dataset.
    rb_dataset_read()
    View a single Dataset.
    rb_dataset_update()
    Modify an existing Dataset.
    rb_experiments_list()
    Paginated list of all experiments. Advanced filtering can be done with the /search endpoint.
    rb_experiments_read()
    Retrieve details for an experiment given it's accession code
    rb_get_client()
    Low level api client accessor
    rb_get_token()
    Create or get an active API token for use in downloading from the API
    rb_institutions_list()
    Unpaginated list of all the available "institution" information
    rb_jobs_downloader_list()
    List of all DownloaderJob
    rb_jobs_downloader_read()
    Retrieves a DownloaderJob by ID
    rb_jobs_processor_list()
    List of all ProcessorJobs.
    rb_jobs_processor_read()
    Retrieves a ProcessorJob by ID
    rb_jobs_survey_list()
    List of all SurveyJob.
    rb_jobs_survey_read()
    Retrieves a SurveyJob by ID
    rb_organisms()
    List all available organisms from refine.bio
    rb_organisms_list()
    Paginated list of all the available organisms.
    rb_organisms_read()
    Retrieves an organism by its name.
    rb_original_files_list()
    List Original Files that are associated with Samples. These are the files we proccess.
    rb_original_files_read()
    Retrieves an Original File by its ID
    rb_platforms()
    List all available platforms from refine.bio
    rb_platforms_list()
    Unpaginated list of all the available "platform" information
    rb_processors_list()
    List all processors.
    rb_processors_read()
    Retrieves a processor by its ID
    rb_qn_targets_list()
    This is a list of all of the organisms which have available QN Targets
    rb_qn_targets_read()
    Get a detailed view of the Quantile Normalization file for an organism.
    rb_samples_list()
    Returns detailed information about Samples
    rb_samples_read()
    Retrieve the details for a Sample given its accession code
    rb_search()
    Perform a search against refine.bio api
    rb_search_list()
    Use this endpoint to search among the experiments.
    rb_stats_failures_downloader_list()
    API endpoint stats_failures_downloader_list
    rb_stats_failures_processor_list()
    API endpoint stats_failures_processor_list
    rb_stats_list()
    Statistics about the health of the system.
    rb_transcriptome_indices_list()
    List all Transcriptome Indices. These are a special type of process result, necessary for processing other SRA samples.
    rb_transcriptome_indices_read()
    Gets the S3 url associated with the organism and length, along with other metadata about the transcriptome index we have stored.

    Developed by Alex Ho, Sean Davis.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
